DOC.brief_summary: Investigation effect SiPAP versus NCPAP oxygenation ventilation LBW infants respiratory distress . Our hypothesis LBW infant achieve level oxygenation improve ventilation treat SiPAP compare NCPAP .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Crossover Study Comparing Oxygenation Ventilation Using SiPAP Versus CPAP LBW Infants
DOC.criteria: 1 . LBW infant ( birth weight < 2500 gram ) 2 . Currently nasal CPAP 3 . Use nasal CPAP > 24 hour prior study initiation 4 . If history intubation mechanical ventilation , patient extubated > 24 hour prior study initiation 5 . FiO2 requirement 2550 % 1 . FiO2 requirement > 0.5 2 . Congenital defects/deformities head , pulmonary cardiovascular system 3 . Chromosomal abnormalities/genetic syndrome 4 . Active medical treatment symptomatic PDA 5 . Active medical treatment culture prove sepsis 6 . Within 24 hour invasive surgical procedure
